revised_title: Torsion of Cylinders of Symmetrical Section: A New Method for Thin Sections
tldr: The authors present a new method for solving the St. Venant torsion problem for cylinders of symmetrical sections, focusing on thin sections. They expand the solution in ascending powers of a "thickness parameter" and demonstrate that the method is applicable to a family of sections that can be varied by adjusting the parameter. The authors provide several examples, including a cubic oval resembling an aerofoil section, to illustrate the method's effectiveness.
